trans-unit.source: Manage Hadoop clusters using Azure CLI | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Manage Hadoop clusters using Azure CLI | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to use the Azure CLI to manage Hadoop clusters in HDIsight
trans-unit.target: How to use the Azure CLI to manage Hadoop clusters in HDIsight

trans-unit.source: Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using the Azure CLI
trans-unit.target: Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight using the Azure CLI

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the [Azure Command-line Interface](../xplat-cli-install.md) to manage Hadoop clusters in Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the [Azure Command-line Interface](../xplat-cli-install.md) to manage Hadoop clusters in Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI is implemented in Node.js.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI is implemented in Node.js.

trans-unit.source: It can be used on any platform that supports Node.js, including Windows, Mac, and Linux.
trans-unit.target: It can be used on any platform that supports Node.js, including Windows, Mac, and Linux.

trans-unit.source: This article covers only using the Azure CLI with HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This article covers only using the Azure CLI with HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: For a general guide on how to use Azure CLI, see [Install and configure Azure CLI][azure-command-line-tools].
trans-unit.target: For a general guide on how to use Azure CLI, see [Install and configure Azure CLI][azure-command-line-tools].

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you begin this article, you must have the following:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin this article, you must have the following:

trans-unit.source: **An Azure subscription**.
trans-unit.target: **An Azure subscription**.

trans-unit.source: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: **Azure CLI** - See [Install and configure the Azure CLI](../xplat-cli-install.md) for installation and configuration information.
trans-unit.target: **Azure CLI** - See [Install and configure the Azure CLI](../xplat-cli-install.md) for installation and configuration information.
